unnormalised: Arrey bhai, mhaagelea ghara laginch te naven bandhtat to flyover khup vhodd asa! Mhaka aikunk ailem ki to sumar 2.5 km lambi echo asa. Teache khambe khup zadd asa, sumar 1.5 m diameter ashet? Ani engineer sangta asle ki tanim sumar, 50000 kg ishtil ekach sectionak vaparle asa! Pisshem, nhoi mhonn? Mhaka aasa asa ki ti traffic jam komi korteli; sodyak tori, ti mhajea commute-ak sumar 30 min add korti asa, kaim tori!
normalised: Arrey bhai, mhajea ghara lagin jeo novo flyover bandhtat to khup vhodd asa! Hanvem aikola ki to sumar don point panch kilometer lamb aasa. Tache thamb khup zadd aasat, sumar ek point panch meter diameter astale? Ani engineeran sangla ki tanim sumar panchash hazar kilogram ispat fakt eka sectionak vaparlem! Pagalponn, barem? Mhaka aasha asa ki to traffic jam komi kortolo; atam mhaka kamak vochonk sumar tis minute chodd lagtat, kamathi kam!
text: Arrey bhai, mhaagelea ghara laginch te naven bandhtat to flyover khup vhodd asa! Mhaka aikunk ailem ki to sumar 2.5 km lambi echo asa. Teache khambe khup zadd asa, sumar 1.5 m diameter ashet? Ani engineer sangta asle ki tanim sumar, 50000 kg ishtil ekach sectionak vaparle asa! Pisshem, nhoi mhonn? Mhaka aasa asa ki ti traffic jam komi korteli; sodyak tori, ti mhajea commute-ak sumar 30 min add korti asa, kaim tori!
